program: Master of Science in Engineering (MSE) - Civil and Environmental Engineering

sections.text: The MSE in Civil and Environmental Engineering provides advanced technical and research training in environmental science, sustainable infrastructure, and structural engineering.
Students combine coursework with original research culminating in a thesis under faculty supervision.

items: Bachelorâ€™s in engineering or related field required
GRE optional; TOEFL/IELTS for non-native speakers
sections.text: Admission requires strong academic preparation in engineering or science fields.
Graduates pursue roles in civil/environmental engineering industries, consulting, and doctoral programs.
